headline: Why Analysts Say the Narrative for Progressive Is Shifting Amid Slower Growth and Rising Competition
summary: The consensus analyst price target for Progressive has recently declined from $287.83 to $278.16. This reduction reflects renewed caution as a result of slowing policy growth and heightened competition, which has offset the impact of recent strong earnings reports. Stay tuned to discover how you can track these price target updates and stay on top of evolving market narratives for Progressive in the months ahead. What Wall Street Has Been Saying Analyst commentary on Progressive has grown...
